Keywords: Animal , Detective , Mystery Inc.
Real Name: Scooby-Doo
Special Powers
QUICK COSTUME CHANGE: Shape Change. When Scooby-Doo uses it and succeeds, this turn friendly characters with the Mystery Inc. keyword can use Toughness.

Scooby-Doo can reroll the break-away rolls of any friendly characters within range. [B]Ruh-roh![/B] Scooby-Doo can use outwit, but only to counter Attack or Damage powers. Force Blast - Let's set the trap! When Scooby-Doo uses Force Blast he may use it as though he occupies an object within range. Smoke Cloud. Super Senses (got that part right) Shape Change.
